Article.ArticleTitle: Complete Genome Sequence of an Enterovirus Type C116 Strain Recovered from Urban Sewage and Determined by Deep Sequencing.

Abstract.AbstractText: Wastewater surveillance allowed the detection of an enterovirus (EV) type rarely reported in clinical settings. We detected an EV-C116 strain in a wastewater sample in France and characterized its complete genome. This virus was genetically closely related to African strains but distantly related to the only complete genome previously described.
